definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Another  fallacy promoted by sales reps.
sentences.chinese: 又是一个销售代表宣扬的谬论。

sentences.english: I answer, that this is a gross fallacy and delusion.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这纯粹是一种谬论和错觉。

sentences.english: Even high school students have gotten in on the action of disproving this myth.
sentences.chinese: 甚至也有中学生加入到戳穿这个谬论的队伍中来。

sentences.english: This is where even myths start getting weirder and weirder.
sentences.chinese: 这甚至是谬论变得越来越怪诞的源头。

sentences.english: The belief that extending your holding period can eliminate the risk of stocks is simply bogus.
sentences.chinese: 认为延长持股期限可以消除股票风险的想法只是谬论。

sentences.english: Another fallacy seldom contradicted is that exports are good, imports bad.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个极少被反驳的谬论即出口有益，进口无益。

sentences.english: But those are just my own unscientific quibbles.
sentences.chinese: 这些仅仅是我自己不科学的谬论。

sentences.english: Why issue mis-truths that may come back to bite you after a social gathering?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要说出社交聚会之后反咬你一口的谬论呢？

sentences.english: There is a fallacy which I shall call the ' essentialist fallacy'.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个我称之为“实有执”的谬论。

sentences.english: He smiled at the manifest absurdity.
sentences.chinese: 他对这明显的谬论付之一笑。

sentences.english: It stubbornly repeats all the fallacies of Comte.
sentences.chinese: 它倔强地重复着孔德的谬论。

sentences.english: And this called the ad hominem fallacy.
Well, it's really a myth that we need to eat animal foodsfor protein.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我们需要吃动物食品来得到蛋白质真的是个谬论。

sentences.english: This is the fallacy of affirming the consequent.
But a new sex-therapy study has discovered that this is a fallacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是一项新的性治疗研究却推翻了这一谬论。

definition: strange tales and absurd arguments (idiom)/unreasonable remarks
